## NFTCollection.supplyOf() method

Get the supply of NFT editions minted from a specific NFT

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
supplyOf(mintAddress: string): Promise<bigint>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mintAddress | string | the mint address of the NFT to check the supply of |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;bigint&gt;

the supply of the specified NFT

## Example


```jsx
const address = "...";
const supply = await program.supplyOf(addres);
```
